entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
